name: MindCron
tag_list: startup-jobs-in-europe, startups, press-release, review, corporate, entrepreneurs, ceo-talks, finance, investment, funding, banking, technology, articles, new-ideas, business
overview:
MindCron was founded to act as an interactive platform for entrepreneurs globally. The idea behind MindCron is to create an online platform to profiling the statups, entrepreneurial dream and make an interactive startup ecosystem around the globe. You can find the best articles related to Technology, innovative startups, Thoughts of entrepreneurs, Press release, corporate finance/funding and lots more. Our insight composition is mostly enjoyed by Entrepreneurs, Tech geeks, Young Leaders etc.

MindCron team is working closely to create an online question forum to support all kind of startup desires, which is named as startup’s questionnaire.

Mindcron was founded by Mr. Sanjit Kumar Vimal- an alumni of National Institute of Technology, who is a techie and associated with technology for a decade.

The Vision: - “MindCron will be recognized and respected as a professional, innovative and knowledge based platform”

MindCron: - http://www.mindcron.com MindCron’s Questionnaire: - http://www.startupsqa.mindcron.com

Email :- info@mindcron.com

MindCron.com became a very popular site for all startup activity. Is has got lot of interesting features such as. Online submission feature: - Startups, Press Release, Upcoming Event Startups: – Covers the story about Startups world Press Release: – Press Release for startups Review: – All Reviews General Review: – General Review about business, e-commerce Product Review: – In depth review of Product/Services Corporate: – Corporate world Entrepreneurs: – Story about individual Entrepreneur CEO Talks: – Full interview or any thought to the world by the expert Entrepreneurs Finance: – Interested to watch all financial movement Investment: – Related to investment Funding: – Related to corporate funding Banking: – Technological or a fundamental Gyan about Banking Technology: – Geek on technology Articles: – All types of articles New Ideas: – A new idea or thought related to business or technology Business: – Articles about business Event: - All upcoming Events

Mission of mindcron:- “MindCron will be recognized and respected as a professional, innovative and knowledge based platform”

milestones.description: It became a very popular in the startup world
